scripts.build: tsc && vite build && esbuild code.ts --bundle --outfile=dist/code.js --platform=browser --target=es2017 && cp manifest.json dist/manifest.json
scripts.watch: concurrently "tsc --watch --noEmit" "vite build --watch" "esbuild code.ts --bundle --outfile=dist/code.js --platform=browser --target=es2017 --watch" "fswatch -o manifest.json | xargs -n1 -I{} cp manifest.json dist/manifest.json"
